content.text: Willow Smith was born in Los Angeles, California.

content.sourceTitle: Will Smith: "I Am Not" A Scientologist
content.text: Willow's religion, well, it could be about anything. Her parents, who have been rumored to be Scientologists but denied it,
are so religiously open-minded that their brains might fall out. Check out the Hollowverse profile of Will Smith.

content.sourceTitle: Will Smith Says his kids won't 'break' under the weight of independence
content.text: We do know that Willow's parents are surely not going to push any belief system on her. They are notorious for the freedom they allow her.
Her mother, Jada Pinkett Smith, said:

content.sourceTitle: Nico Lang: Willow Smith and Female Body Image: Why Girls Have the Right To Own Themselves
content.text: I made a promise to endow my little girl with the power to always know that her body, spirit and her mind are her domain.
Much has yet to be seen with this young star. Keep us updated in the comments.

Smith will not be able to vote until the mid-term elections in 2018. Furthermore, I submit that the political views of tweens are not only irrelevant, but likely quite stupid, or at least, painfully uninformed.
That being said, we know that her father is a Democrat and an Obama supporter.

content.sourceTitle: Video: Willow Smith's Performance at White House Easter Egg Roll.
content.text: And Willow has performed at the White House under the Obama administration.
So, I guess we've got ourselves a little Democrat.
